Description.Text: Nobilis is a prestigious 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Lviv. Highlights include a spa and free Wi-Fi. Lviv is a historic city in west Ukraine with a strong cultural and architectural legacy. Nearby places of interest include St George's Cathedral, Lviv History Museum and the Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site boasting beautiful medieval buildings. Ivan Franko tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Lviv destinations. The hotel occupies a grand mid-rise property. Facilities include a sauna, gym and whirlpool. A range of massages and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic Standard rooms are 24sqm and decorated in a lavish style with custom-made furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The restaurant offers gourmet Mediterranean cuisine in a charming and sophisticated setting. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible nearby. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
